participant_2.background:
My parents are always busy with work, so I spend most of my time alone.
I'm always looking for new ways to improve my photography skills, so I'd love to learn more about how to take better pictures of nature.
i have many girlfriends.
i like pizza.
I once ate ice cream in my underwear in public, but then I realized people were staring at me, so I ran away.

content.text: Pretty good! I'm a photographer and I like to take pictures of nature.
That's cool! I like to play guitar to express my feelings.
Oh, what kind of music do you like to play?
I like to play a lot of different kinds of music, but my favorite is probably Isaiah Rashad.
I've never heard of him, but I'll check him out!
He's a great artist, I think you'll like him.
No problem! So, do you have any other hobbies?
I like to spend time with my friends and family, and I also like to go out and explore new places.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to do those things too.
It is! I'm glad we have some things in common.
